name: The Haunted Cemetery
description:
Video game created with Unreal Engine 4 made in 2 weeks with 3 other people for a school project. The goal, create a mini RPG with about 10 minutes of gameplay.

You play as John, desperately looking for her wife in The Haunted Cemetery...

Controls:
ZQSD - movement (sorry I'm french)
Mouse movement - Rotate camera / look around
Mouse left click - Attack
C - Crouch
Shift - Run
Space - Jump
Left alt - Free look

Credits:
Adam Cyffka as Gameplay & UI developer
Valentin Masson as Level Designer
William Petitprez as AI Developer
Emilien Delevoye as Character Animator

Most of the assets are from the Unreal Assets Store
